item.title: LG Optimus F7 Kernel
item.description: The LG Optimus F7 kernel brings some extra freedom for the device. The kernel comes with a few extra governors for more control over performance. It also allows extensive debloating without setting the device into a bootloop. Init-d is also a nice touch if you like running custom scripts. Check full details below…
